introduce_product: A mature design accented by the liberal use of rose gold colored metal parts gives this model the look of a fashionable accessory. Gloss black resin digital watch with a pink face.
list_specification_product: Memory capacity: Up to 25 sets of data, each set including;
Name (8 characters) and telephone number (12 digits)

29 time zones (30 cities), city code display, daylight
saving on/off

Automatically counts down the days from the current date to
a target date.

Measuring modes: Elapsed time, split time, 1st-2nd place
times

Input Range: 1 minute to 24 hours (1-minute increments and
1-hour increments)
Full Auto Calendar (pre-programmed until the year 2099)
